A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible in every way. From Mary Poppins in space to the death of a Sith Lord which we know nothing about. We have a crap plot that seemed scattered and convenient. Rose was a complete waste of a character. No attachment to characters\, especially the relationship between Luke and Kylo. We needed some more back story to understand the gravity of that scene. They went overkill with the Porgs and Finn besting Phasma meant nothing since we know nothing about Phasma.
